name: It Was Him: The Many Murders of Ed Edwards
original_name: It Was Him: The Many Murders of Ed Edwards
overview: In this true-crime docuseries, veteran detective John Cameron investigates convicted serial killer Ed Edwards and uncovers mounting evidence that connects Edwards to some of the most infamous murder cases of the last 60 years, many of which are still unsolved. Cameron is joined by Edwards's own grandson, Wayne Wolfe, as they search for the truth.

episodes.name: The Killer Gene
episodes.overview: Wayne Wolfe Jr. discovers his grandfather was the serial killer Edward Wayne Edwards and teams up with retired detective John Cameron. They examine Edwards as a suspect in various murder cases including The Zodiac, JonBenet Ramsey and many more.

episodes.name: Slaves In The After Life
episodes.overview: Wayne and John head to San Francisco where they examine Edwards involvement in one of the most chilling unsolved cases in American history â€“ the Zodiac murders. Wayne visits his relatives to find out more about his grandfather.

episodes.name: Child Killer
episodes.overview: John Cameron has a theory that Edwards was capable of killing children, including the child beauty queen JonBenet Ramsey and the Atlanta Child killer.

episodes.name: A Double Life
episodes.overview: John Cameron examines the gulf between Ed Edwards's public persona and his secret life as a killer, which may have included the murder of union leader Jimmy Hoffa.
